text: bhadramāya kēāṭṭakaḷēāṭukūṭiya paṭṭaṇaṅṅaḷil veccēā vanmatilukaḷkku piṟake oḷiccirunnēā allāte avareārikkaluṁ onnāyi niṅṅaḷēāṭ yud'dhaṁ ceyyukayilla. avarkkiṭayil parasparapēār atirūkṣamatre. avar oṟṟakkeṭṭāṇenn nī karutunnu. ennāl avaruṭe manas'sukaḷ palatāṇ. kāraṇaṁ, avar kāryaṁ śariyānvidhaṁ manas'silākkāttavarāṇennatutanne
